entry.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18902)
entry.content:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

entry.title: 10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

10 years ago, we were honoring the life of Alonzo Ashely. Today we come back to the same place to keep honoring his life and supporting his family. It doesn’t matter how much time passes by, we will keep remembering the life of every person of color, black and brown, that has been killed in the hands of police. One day we will end with this practice of abuse, creating legislations to take away the protection of all those corrupt police officers that think that just because they have a badge, it gives them permission to kill our people. Marking the life of families, we will keep marching in the streets to end police brutality.

entry.title: I’m a third generation survivor 🧡 - Every child matters...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

I’m a third generation survivor 🧡

-

Every child matters 🧡

...

Today is the Day for Truth and Reconciliation, also known as Orange Shirt Day. If you’re an Indigenous ally, take this day [and every day] to learn more about the historical and current realities of Indigenous Peoples 🪶

-

For content on Residential Schools, visit the following sites:

https://legacyofhope.ca

https://nctr.ca/…/teaching-reso…/residential-school-history/

https://education.afn.ca/…/learning-mo…/residential-schools/

-

#EveryChildMatters #ResidentialSchools #TruthBeforeReconciliation #OrangeShirtDay #MoreThanOneDay

See More

entry.title: Hello Denver and beyond, please make sure you mark your...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Hello Denver and beyond, please make sure you mark your calendar‘s for this Friday, October 1 from 4 to 6 PM.

Here is what happened:
Alanzo Ashley was at the zoo with his family in 2011. This man began to visibly display symptoms of heat stroke￼￼￼. Alonzo should have been treated with medical care by Zoo staff and any other responding personnel, instead Denver police were called and when they arrived they tackled him and used a taser when they did not need to and as a result... his heart stopped.

Who took responsibility:
After a 10 year up hill battle with no one from the city or the zoo even offering as little as an apology to the family in the mourning or a community in outrage￼. After a law suit and many years of protesting outside of the zoo, after distributing water bottles and information regarding what happened.￼￼

October 1st from 4:00 - 6:00:
The zoo staff coordinated by Dr. Mosby Tyler have been working with ￼the family, around the development of a water fountain and cooling station in memory of Alonzo Ashley. This memorial will be unveiled this Friday, October 1 between 4 PM and 6 PM. Friends Family and Community are welcome￼￼, Zoo admission will be free to those who attend.

Link to event here:

https://facebook.com/events/s/in-memory-of-alonzo-ashley/541435653623950/

entry.title: Maria is cooking with us for the first time this week! She was...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Maria is cooking with us for the first time this week! She was featured in the documentary about Solidarity Meals from @wastelandofwonder, check it out to see her and her daughter Edna in the kitchen. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co, and we always appreciate y’all liking, sharing, and saving our posts to help spread the word.

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoTania has been working towards obtaining her residency so she can stay in Denver with her...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Tania has been working towards obtaining her residency so she can stay in Denver with her children, mother, and siblings. She has built a life here with her fam...ily and they all plan to stay! Support her legal costs by getting some of her enchiladas this Saturday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

See More

entry.title: Orders close tomorrow, get yours in soon! Here's Tania from...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Orders close tomorrow, get yours in soon! Here's Tania from last solidarity meals making the enchiladas. One of the many great things about solidarity meals, is we ensure no food goes to waste! If families are unable to take extras home, we get the extra meals to houseless folk in Denver, another part in our communities mutual aid circle! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co/
